CustomField.description: This field was requested by the Partner Relations and College Counseling teams. It indicates the type of pathway a student can follow to attend the channel partner school. "Bridge" indicates that the student must reapply to the partner after they successfully complete a Verto semester. "Guaranteed" indicates that the student does not need to reapply to the partner school in order to attend.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( LEFT( RecordTypeId , 15) = LEFT( $Label.RT_Application_TraditionalEnrollment , 15), NOT(ISBLANK(University__c)) ), "Bridge", IF( LEFT( RecordTypeId , 15) = LEFT( $Label.RT_Application_ChannelEnrollment , 15), "Guaranteed", "" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "Bridge" indicates that the student must reapply to the partner after they successfully complete a Verto semester. "Guaranteed" indicates that the student does not need to reapply to the partner school in order to attend.
CustomField.label: Channel Type
